content.query:
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE tripdata;
DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT SynapseDelimitedTextFormat;

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE,
			 FIRST_ROW = 2,
			 ENCODING = 'UTF8',
			 PARSER_VERSION ='1.0'
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'public_mpajn6axh2pc3wispoc_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [public_mpajn6axh2pc3wispoc_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://public@mpajn6axh2pc3wispoc.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE tripdata (
	[medallion] nvarchar(32),
	[hack_license] nvarchar(32),
	[vendor_id] nvarchar(10),
	[rate_code] bigint,
	[store_and_fwd_flag] nvarchar(4),
	[pickup_datetime] datetime2(0),
	[dropoff_datetime] datetime2(0),
	[passenger_count] bigint,
	[trip_time_in_secs] bigint,
	[trip_distance] float,
	[pickup_longitude] float,
	[pickup_latitude] float,
	[dropoff_longitude] float,
	[dropoff_latitude] float
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'trip-data.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [public_mpajn6axh2pc3wispoc_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.tripdata
GO
